title: Bugsplats before loading screen.
body: Every time I try to get into the loading screen, league bug splats and won't successfully reconnect until the game has already started and it's getting annoying, any solutions?

replies.body:
Hey Potato,

Crashes and Bugsplats like this tend to be because of third party programs messing with the game. Are you running any programs like LolReplay, Curse Voice, or Hamachi? If you are, turning these programs off or removing them might help you out a bit. If you're not running any of these, go ahead and attach your [Dxdiag](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980#wq5) and [r3d logs](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980#wq7) so I can look into this a bit further!

Let me know if this works for you!
Thanks for the info but it seems that you did not experience a crash in this r3d log. Have you experienced the bugsplats today?
No, haven't played a game yet, I might of given you the log of just opening the client today, I'll give you the one from yesterday.

Thanks for the info. It looks like you might have a program still blocking the game. Could you make sure all third party programs are disabled? If you're still having issues after doing that, I'd like to look deeper through a support ticket! You can submit one [here!](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new)
It might be solved for now, did the repair thing before clicking the play button, I'll just reply again if something happens.

I've been having the same problem.  In addition, I also have been getting disconnected from pvp chat, and I often have to restart my client to actually get into the game.  When that happens, I tend to get the message that says that I wasn't able to connect to the servers.
